column4: I'm using huge amount of ram, and I'm not running anything out of the ordinary, any tips on what I can kill to try and free up some of it?(free say's I'm using 911MB, which I can only hope is wrong)
system monitor says nothing is using more than 20MB of ram, so where is all my ram going?
the kernel uses memory for the file cache too and that can take up some considerable space -- usually you dont want to tweak things, the kernel can automatically allocate or swap memory based on need
it's not cache, 11MB is cache, the 911MB is unacounted for...
